; Purpose
* [[Property description::Contains the quantum yield of an experiment or molecular process.@en]]

; Datatype
* [[Has type::Quantity]].

; Values
* Input fields should be restricted to positive numbers (<nowiki>regexp=/^([0-9]*\.)?[0-9]*$/</nowiki>).

; Corresponds
* [[Corresponds to::1 TOF/min]]

; Unit
* [[Display units::TOF/min]]
